    • getChannelValues

      public final EdgeCache.Pair<Map<String,com.google.gson.JsonElement>,Set<String>> getChannelValues(Set<String> addresses)
      Gets the channel values from cache.
      Parameters:
      addresses - the Channel-Addresses of the channels
      Returns:
      a) Map of Channel-Address to values (JsonNull if not in cache); b) Set of Channel-Addresses that are only available as aggregated data
